title: Average
review: Palain River is an important part of the Jim Corbett Tiger Reserve, as it is a very important part of the River Ramganga. River Ramganga forms the most prominent hydrological resource, supplemented by tributaries like Palain River.

title: Nice
review: rightly said by the fellow reviewer, this is an important part of Jim Corbett National Park. It forms an important part of the ecology of the national park.

title: happy you
review: by side you can spend a quality time with your loved ones. with your son who is big enough to hold a drink.

title: Lovely View
review: Views are very impressive, the perfect place to spend alone time with the better half. Do visit this place

title: Cool place
review: Liked the water flow and nice greenary besides the river. BOating and cayaking is available and nice to be here

title: Lovely View”
review: water of palain river is very cold and crystal clear.Nice place to spend some time away from crowd, we stay here few hours during the way to cargett national park from Nanital.

title: spend fun time
review: u can have fun sitting and playing in water .. have some drinks and food ..chill out place .. good to have 2-3 hour fun

title: Must visit river
review: The form of this river is worth seeing. Seeing this, the eyes get comforted. This river can prove to be a good place for history lovers.
